alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Canadian; Kingfisher (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 19 at 7:18PM CDT until September 19 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Kingfisher County in central Oklahoma... East central Blaine County in northwestern Oklahoma... North central Canadian County in central Oklahoma... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 718 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Watonga, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Broadcast media. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Omega. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
